channel.title: Adding correct general gradaar
channel.description: im trying to load the correct gradaar plz help hes all huge and glitched and can only be killed if wearing p ring. I am using a delta source; i want him to be sized down and not glitch when he attacks - links to downloads or tuts would help

item.title: Adding correct general gradaar
item.dc:creator: @GrimReapersScythe GrimReapersScythe
item.description:
@GrimReapersScythe wrote:

He’s not glitched, it’s the model.
The model is not animated, thats why he glitches in and out while walking.
Also, why would you size him down? He is the correct size, and shouldn’t be bigger, nor smaller.
About killing General Graardor, he can be killed without a 'perfect ring; though, he heals, and is difficult to kill. That is why most servers make him drop rares.

Hope this helped,
Tom.

Read full topic
